title: The Restless Rock
description: As we are discovering, all things are alive on some level.The Restless Rock would agree. He has desires, too. He dreamsof being able to move about the world. Well, he gets his wish,but not exactly like he thought. Follow him on his adventuresas heâ€™s transported to different places, learns about the worldaround him, and realizes a thing or two about himself.
author: J.M. Voors
